Before Installing Cloud Pak for Integration
Helm is already used by Cloud Pak for Application.
When Cloud Pak for Integration is trying to install on the same cluster and find same CRD for certificates, installation fails
Running an install after a failed partial install will lead to failure on the ICP creation in kube-system, due to missing secrets.
There is a common component (a certificate) between CP for Integration and CP for Application that causes the CP for Integration installer to fail.
The uninstaller removes common component and allows the full install to run.
Uninstall may hang. To solve, check for pods stuck in terminating state and do a force delete:
Install Cloud Pak for Application: details
